fileTooltips.newFile: Create a new file and reset default font and font size.

textTooltips.fontFamily: Change font in document or selected text.
textTooltips.fontSize: Change font size in document or selected text.
textTooltips.copy: Copy the selected text to clipboard.
textTooltips.paste: Paste text from clipboard into document.
textTooltips.cut: Cut the selected text and copy it to clipboard.
textTooltips.selectAll: Select all text in the document.
textTooltips.alignJustified: Align text to both left and right margins, creating a clean and even look.
textTooltips.textColor: Change the color of text or selected text.
textTooltips.backgroundColor: Change the background color of the document or selected text.

messageboxTooltips.applicationContinue: Open the editor without any applied styles.
messageboxTooltips.applicationCancel: Close the dialog and exit the application.
messageboxTooltips.errorCopy: Copy the error message to the clipboard.
messageboxTooltips.continue: Clear the document and reset font and font size.
messageboxTooltips.saveAs: Save the document under a new file name.
